AI Description: Archspec is a framework for detecting the architecture of a system and producing a structured representation of its features for further analysis and optimization. It aims to provide insights into the architectural characteristics of a computing system, helping developers understand and leverage these features for performance optimization and code generation.
Core Features: Detecting System Architecture, Producing Structured Representation Of System Features, Performance Optimization, Code Generation
General Tags: Architecture Detection, System Analysis, Performance Optimization, Code Generation
